data.meta_description: Railway Systems Academy is a worldwide training center and stands for comprehensive professional training in the railway sector.
data.text:
Railway Systems Academy

Railway Systems Academy is a worldwide training center and stands for comprehensive professional training and knowledge transfer in the railway sector. We have expert know-how in the areas of turnout technology, rail technology, signaling systems and track superstructure as well as maintenance.

About us

Trainings

We offer a comprehensive trainings program for wide areas of the railway sector. Experts with many years of experience in their respective areas conduct the training courses and the trainings themselves are aimed at a broad range of target groups: from beginner to specialists and experts, and from technicians to managers.

Go to trainings

Our Locations

Our training services are available at 8 campus, located in 5 countries. Each campus represents a thematic area of specialization in the international railway industry. On request, our training courses can also be held directly at the customer's site or on the track.

All Locations

Classroom training & Seminars

The more complex a given topic and the more interaction with our experts and/or training objects is necessary, training in presence becomes even more essential. In these classroom training sessions, we transfer our expert know-how to prepare you in the best way possible regarding your individual challenges.

Seminars

Webinars

Benefit from live interaction with our experts regardless of location! Webinars do not replace classroom-training at the Railway Systems Academy, but complement it and are used when the learning content allows it.

Webinars

E-Learnings

Our user-friendly e-learning units allow you to learn from anywhere, anytime and independent of the end device to acquire knowledge. Learn independently, at your own pace and according to your personal needs.

E-Learnings

Individual training programs

We offer customized courses for your individual needs. Both course content and agenda can be customized and linked to your own requirements. Let us know your educational needs and we will come to you with a customized training program.

Your educational needs
